enumvalue.name: NRF_SPIM_ALL_INTS_MASK
enumvalue.initializer:
= NRF_SPIM_INT_STARTED_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_STOPPED_MASK
| NRF_SPIM_INT_RXREADY_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_RXBUSERROR_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_RXMATCH0_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_RXMATCH1_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_RXMATCH2_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_RXMATCH3_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_TXREADY_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_TXBUSERROR_MASK
| NRF_SPIM_INT_ENDRX_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_ENDTX_MASK | NRF_SPIM_INT_END_MASK

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_SPIM_Type *p_reg, uint32_t sck_pin, uint32_t mosi_pin, uint32_t miso_pin)
memberdef.name: nrf_spim_pins_set

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring SPIM pins.

detaileddescription.para: If a given signal is not needed, pass the NRF_SPIM_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
SCK pin number.
MOSI pin number.
MISO pin number.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the SCK pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the MOSI pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the MISO pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_SPIM_Type *p_reg, uint32_t pin, nrf_spim_csn_pol_t polarity, uint32_t duration)
memberdef.name: nrf_spim_csn_configure

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the SPIM hardware CSN pin.

detaileddescription.para: If this signal is not needed, pass the NRF_SPIM_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
CSN pin number.
CSN pin polarity.

Minimum duration between the edge of CSN and the edge of SCK and minimum duration of CSN must stay unselected between transactions. The value is specified in number of 64 MHz clock cycles (15.625 ns).

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the CSN pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the SPIM DCX pin.

detaileddescription.para: If this signal is not needed, pass the NRF_SPIM_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
DCX pin number.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the DCX pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the number of command bytes.

detaileddescription.para: Maximum value available for dividing the transmitted bytes into command bytes and data bytes is NRF_SPIM_DCX_CNT_ALL_CMD - 1. The NRF_SPIM_DCX_CNT_ALL_CMD value passed as the count parameter causes all transmitted bytes to be marked as command bytes.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Number of command bytes preceding the data bytes.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the extended SPIM interface.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Sample delay for input serial data on MISO, specified in 64 MHz clock cycles (15.625 ns) from the sampling edge of SCK.

briefdescription.para: Macro getting pointer to the structure of registers of the SPIM peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: SPIM instance index.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the SPIM peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Symbol indicating whether 16 MHz clock frequency is available.
Symbol indicating whether 32 MHz clock frequency is available.
Symbol indicating whether frequency is used.
Symbol indicating whether prescaler is used.
Symbol indicating whether EasyDMA array list feature is present.
Symbol indicating whether dedicated DMA register is present.
Symbol indicating whether SPIM DMA tasks and events are present.
Macro for checking if the hardware chip select function is available.
Macro for checking if the DCX pin control is available.
Macro for checking if the RXDELAY function is available.
Macro for checking if the STALLSTAT feature is available.
Symbol indicating whether any of the SPIM extended features is available.

This value specified in the DCX line configuration causes this line to be set low during whole transmission (all transmitted bytes are marked as command bytes). Any lower value causes the DCX line to be switched from low to high after this number of bytes is transmitted (all remaining bytes are marked as data bytes).
This value can be used as a parameter for the nrf_spim_pins_set function to specify that a given SPI signal (SCK, MOSI, or MISO) shall not be connected to a physical pin.
Max number of RX patterns.
Symbol specifying default value of DCX pin setting.
Symbol specifying default value of CSN pin setting.
Symbol specifying default value of CSN duration setting.
Symbol specifying default value of CSN polarity setting.
Symbol specifying default value of RX delay setting.
Minimal SPIM frequency in Hz.
Base frequency value 320 MHz for SPIM.
Base frequency value 192 MHz for SPIM.
Base frequency value 128 MHz for SPIM.
Base frequency value 64 MHz for SPIM.
Base frequency value 32 MHz for SPIM.
Base frequency value 16 MHz for SPIM.
Macro for checking whether the base frequency for the specified SPIM instance is 320 MHz.
Macro for checking whether the base frequency for the specified SPIM instance is 192 MHz.
Macro for checking whether the base frequency for the specified SPIM instance is 128 MHz.
Macro for checking whether the base frequency for the specified SPIM instance is 64 MHz.
Macro for checking whether the base frequency for the specified SPIM instance is 32 MHz.
Macro for getting base frequency value in Hz for the specified SPIM instance.
Macro for getting the maximum value of PRESCALER register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Macro for getting the minimum value of PRESCALER register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Macro for computing prescaler value for a given SPIM instance and desired frequency.

simplesect.para: Not every combination of base and desired frequency is supported. The NRF_SPIM_FREQUENCY_STATIC_CHECK macro can be used to check if the desired frequency is supported.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Desired frequency value in Hz.

briefdescription.para: Macro for checking whether specified frequency can be achieved for a given SPIM instance.

simplesect.para: This macro uses a compile-time assertion.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Desired frequency value in Hz.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer for managing the SPIM peripheral.
